definition: to visit a doctor/to see a patient
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
illness/CL:場|场[chang2]/disease/to fall ill/defect

sentences.english: In fact, now to the hair out-patient treatment, but also many young people.
sentences.chinese: 其實，現在來毛髮門診看病的，也多是年輕人。

sentences.english: Can you help me? I have to see Professor Liu and she is a gynecologist.
sentences.chinese: 我需要找婦科的劉醫生看病，你能幫我嗎？

sentences.english: A man sitting in the waiting-room wanted to see the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 在候診室中坐着的男人想找醫生看病。

sentences.english: Kunta thought, to carry sick men upstairs for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 帶一些生病的人到樓下去看病。

sentences.english: you know, like, paying bills and setting up cable, and you know, talking to doctors.
sentences.chinese: 比如，支付賬單，開通網絡，還有去找醫生看病。

sentences.english: He got off early and went to the clinic.
sentences.chinese: 他提早下班，到門診所看病去了。

sentences.english: Patients complain that their doctors hustle them through appointments.
sentences.chinese: 病人抱怨他們的醫生看病敷衍了事。

sentences.english: There are people coming down from the villages.
sentences.chinese: 也有人從山下的村裏跑上來看病。

sentences.english: Xiaoli promised that he would see docter in the early morning next day.
sentences.chinese: 小李答應第二天一大早就去看病。

sentences.english: Qiu Wen give any way to see a doctor, found that just a little cold, they will return.
sentences.chinese: 邱雯給任路東看病，發現只是有點感冒，便折返。

sentences.english: Don't be bullheaded; see a doctor.
People are going for second and third consultations with their GP.
sentences.chinese: 人們正在第二次和第三次看病，諮詢他們的醫生。

sentences.english: At present "Costliness in Seeking Medical Treatment" has been a social phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 當前，“看病貴”已成爲一種社會現象。

sentences.english: In order to solve the difficulty of expensive medical treatment problem.
sentences.chinese: 爲切實解決人民羣衆看病難看病貴的問題。

sentences.english: In order to solve the difficulty of expensive medical treatment problem.
sentences.chinese: 爲切實解決人民羣衆看病難看病貴的問題。

sentences.english: Those machines the doctor uses when you visit?
sentences.chinese: 還記得你看病時醫生用的那些儀器嗎？

definition: to prescribe medicine
to treat an illness
to visit a patient at home (of a doctor)/house call
to seek medical treatment/to see a doctor
to register (at a hospital etc)/to send by registered mail
to make up a prescription (of herbal medicine)

to be in hospital/to be hospitalized
medical fees
outpatient service
to see a doctor/to seek medical advice

to receive medical treatment
to diagnose and treat
clinic
